posts.title: The Joy of GSoC :)
posts.description: This marks the last day of coding phase. Here I have shared my experience for one of my best summer vacations.

posts.title: Eighth & Ninth week of coding phase, GSoC'18
posts.description: The third phase of coding period has begun. During this period, UserScript API, ExtensionScheme API and ability to register a QtObject as an external js object are developed.

posts.title: Seventh week of coding phase, GSoC'18
posts.description: During this period Events API, I18n API and improvements in Tabs API are introduced.

posts.title: Sixth week of coding phase, GSoC'18
posts.description: A log of progress made in the sixth week of coding phase. This includes Menu API, Settings API and documentation of the APIs developed in previous weeks.

posts.title: Fifth week of coding phase, GSoC'18
posts.description: This includes developing GUI for QML Plugins. Two new APIs are introduced for this - BrowserAction API and SideBar API.
